ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] guardian/sentry girdle?
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve fought Guardians (and Sentries) there were both blue and green to me. Don t really recall if the greens ever dropped anything.   None of them were
ygData.messageBody:
I've fought Guardians (and Sentries) there were both blue and green to me.
Don't really recall if the greens ever dropped anything. None of them were
particularly challenging to me - as long as you don't have a bad pull - and
there are plenty of good places to camp within running distance of the zone.
This is an "outdoor" zone - so Selo's works (well if you call it working at
the moment ): )

Sorry - I don't know exact level range - not sure how to determine for
blues...

Slyde Katzenjammer
52 Bard



-----Original Message-----
From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 11:55 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] guardian/sentry girdle?

I know alot of people have a haste belt but this post is more reguarding the
ones that dont.

In skyshrine, the guardians and sentries drop some decent belts. Now this
tends to make me think that farmers wont be selling them so the guardian
ones might just rot there. Anyone have any idea if they're somewhat common
drops? I myself dont want to waste away my dragon faction but i'm thinking
if someone i camping the guardians they might not need belts.

Considering the sludge girdle stats and the other 2 belts stats, i'd rather
go for save vs. magic instead of mana/int. Also considering how low my
stamina is makes both sentry and guardian belts very attractive to me.

Sludged Girdle 8ac Cha +5, Int +5, HP +20, Mana +10 (worth 5-8k, lore
and tradeable)
Sentry Girdle 10ac Cha +5, Agi +8, HP +10, SV M +5 (lore, tradeable, no
idea of worth)
Guardian Girdle 12ac Cha +5, Sta +8, HP +10, SV M +5 (lore, no drop)

PS. What lev are sentries and what lev are guardians?


Any thoughts/comments?

Minkin

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
